initial_data_form.name: The id of the report
initial_data_form.description: Go to: https://<yourdomain>.bamboohr.com/app/reports/ to find the id of the report. click on the report and then look at the url. There is a number that will represent the ID of the report.

initial_data_form.name: The id of the company
initial_data_form.description: When you login you get a domain like this: https://<yourdomain>.bamboohr.com/. The '<yourdomain>' is your domain name.
